lines.text: On a mountaintop, high above a large city, stands the headquarters of a man devoted to the cause of freedom and justice... a war hero who has never stopped fighting against his country's enemies... a private citizen who is dedicating his life to the struggle against evil men everywhere... CAPTAIN MIDNIGHT!
the campus hero and the greasy grind.
You taught me all I know about science; I could never teach you anything about football.
Gosh! Nobody could teach me anything.
Ikky, if you weren't the best flight engineer in 70 states, I'd never made it back from that last recon run in Korea.
[Ikky explains his theory on why the missiles disappeared]

They fire off the rocket - BANG! - It flies through the air - WHOOSH! - It hits the water - SPLASH! - It sinks to the bottom - BUBBLE, BUBBLE, BUBBLE! - Along comes a great, big whale - GOBBLE, GOBBLE, GOBBLE! See?
[Ikky sees Captain Midnight, Tut and Steve staring at him incredulously]
When do they fire the next rocket?
Tomorrow morning. And by tomorrow night, if I don't recover it, they'll be firing *me*.
